Package org.apache.jackrabbit.core.xml

Class Summary
AbstractSAXEventGenerator AbstractSAXEventGenerator serves as the base class for SysViewSAXEventGenerator and DocViewSAXEventGenerator

It traverses a tree of NodeState & PropertyState instances, and calls the abstract methods entering(NodeState, org.apache.jackrabbit.core.QName, int) enteringProperties(NodeState, org.apache.jackrabbit.core.QName, int) leavingProperties(NodeState, org.apache.jackrabbit.core.QName, int) leaving(NodeState, org.apache.jackrabbit.core.QName, int) entering(PropertyState, int) leaving(PropertyState, int) for every item state that is granted read access.
DocViewImportHandler DocViewImportHandler ...
DocViewSAXEventGenerator A DocViewSAXEventGenerator instance can be used to generate SAX events representing the serialized form of an item in Document View XML.
ImportHandler An ImportHandler instance can be used to import serialized data in System View XML or Document View XML.
SysViewImportHandler SysViewImportHandler ...
SysViewSAXEventGenerator A SysViewSAXEventGenerator instance can be used to generate SAX events representing the serialized form of an item in System View XML.
